author: "Hock de Brackenau, Wendelin, fl. 1502"
title: "Mentagra, sive tractatus excellens de causis preservativis, regimine, et cura morbi gallici: sive (ut Galli dicunt) neapolitani: capita xvii ac recepta quinque necnon varia unguenta continens ... Ejusdem perutilis tractatus de curandis ulceribus hunc morb"
